meanings.definition: A person or animal who cuddles.
meanings.sent1: My dog and cat are cuddlers who love to snuggle with me on the couch.
meanings.sent2: The daycare center for pets has many cuddlers who provide comfort to the animals.
meanings.sent3: The cuddlers at the animal shelter make sure every furry friend gets a warm hug before bedtime.
meanings.sent4: In the world of stuffed animals, the teddy bears are the ultimate cuddlers, always ready for a hug.
meanings.sent5: The therapy dogs are known as expert cuddlers, bringing joy and warmth to everyone they meet.

meanings.sent1: At the sleepover, the girls brought their favorite cuddlers to snuggle with at night.
meanings.sent2: The children's book featured a group of cuddlers who went on adventures together.
meanings.sent3: The cuddlers in the toy store seemed to have a secret meeting every night, discussing their cuddling techniques.
meanings.sent4: The cuddlers on the shelf looked so cozy and inviting, tempting anyone to pick them up for a hug.
meanings.sent5: During the movie night, everyone brought their cuddlers to hold onto during the scary scenes.
